timeline.message: feat(property): Consolidated DETECT_REPORT_TIMEOUT and BLACKDUCK_TIMEOUT into DETECT_TIMEOUT (IDETECT-2323).

timeline.bodyHTML:
Shouldn't we add

else if(detectConfiguration.wasPropertyProvided(DetectProperties.DETECT_REPORT_TIMEOUT) {
    return getValue(DetectProperties.DETECT_REPORT_TIMEOUT);
} else {
    return getValue(DetectProperties.DETECT_TIMEOUT);
}

Without the else if the user can set the DETECT_REPORT_TIMEOUT and it is never used. Being that it is deprecated shouldn't it take precedence over the new property.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Return right away if non-deprecated timeout property is set.
